description:
Here are 6 simple and effective tips to level up your investing game from diversifying your portfolio to investing regularly in stocks and short-term treasuries. We go over how much you need to invest and why it’s better to start now.

Read Laila Maidan's full article here: https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-tips-for-2024-to-achieve-financial-goals-stash-cio-2023-12?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=business-description.

00:00 - Intro 
00:22  - Tip 1: Diversify
01:07 - Tip 2: Invest regularly
02:18 - Tip 3: Be Aware Of Fees
03:06 - Tip 4: Short-Term Treasurys 
03:40 - Tip 5: Compound Interest
04:34 - Tip 6: Avoid Concentrated Risk
05:11 - Conclusion
05:48 - Credits

------------------------------------------------------

title: Investing For Beginners: 6 Simple Tips To Start Saving Now | Business Insider
